definitions.definition: (the person or thing) after everyone or everything else:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] I hate being the last one to arrive at a meeting.
I've finished my essay at last!

definitions.definition: the least expected or wanted person or thing:
examples: Three extra people to feed - that's the last thing I need!

definitions.definition: at the latest time in the day:
examples: I'll switch on the washing machine last thing so it'll be finished when I get up in the morning.

definitions.definition: If you say that it is the last time you will do something, you mean that you will never do it again:
examples: He never even thanked me, so that's the last time I do him a favour.

definitions.definition: (being) the only one or part that is left:
examples: Do you mind if I have the last chocolate?

definitions.definition: (being) the most recent or the one before the present one:
examples: Did you hear the storm last night (= during the previous night)?

definitions.definition: to continue being good or suitable:
examples: There's no point buying something that isn't going to last.
